item.title: "Like Stepping Into A Hurricane": Rey's New Jedi Order Movie Writer Describes What It's Like Joining Star Wars, Offers Reassuring Update After Recent Changes
item.description: Steven Knight left Rey's New Jedi Order movie last October. Now, he speaks out about writing Star Wars - and offers a reassuring update.

item.title: Sicario Ending Explained: What The CIA's Real Mission Was
item.description: Denis Villeneuve's action thriller Sicario is an intense film that ends on a dark note as Emily Blunt's Kate realizes what their mission really was.

item.title: Divergent Producer Launching New AI Studio With Goal To Produce Roughly 30 Low-Budget Movies Over The Next 3-4 Years
item.description: Divergent producer Pouya Shahbazian is launching a new production studio, aiming to produce 30 low-budget films over the next 3-4 years using AI tech.
